name: Ninja of Fruit
description:
Finally released!

In this game you can click on apples, bananas, chocolate bars, and bombs. You get the same points for apples and for bananas, but if you click on a bomb you lose points and for a chocolate bar you get 100 points. Try to get the highest score possible which is 900!

THE BIGGEST UPDATE SO FAR!
  • Bug fixes
  • New sprites
  • Added sounds

Music: TheFatRat - Epic https://lnk.to/ftrepic
